Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Эти четверо студентов{Line} достойно показали себя{Line} в бою и сдали экзамен.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“These are the 4 students{Line} that passed today’s exam.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Прежде всего, хочу вас поздравить!{Line} Однако...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“First of all, congratulations.{Line} However...”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Теперь вы полноправные сиды.{Line} Элитные наемники сада Баламба.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“From now on, as a member of SeeD,{Line} you will be dispatched all over the world.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Вы отправитесь на задания.{Line} Возможно, в самые дальние{Line} уголки мира.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We are proud to introduce SeeD,{Line} {Term Balamb} Garden’s mercenary soldiers.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Но я верю, что везде и всегда,{Line} вы будете с честью сражаться{Line} и не посрамите репутацию{Line} нашей академии!”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“SeeD soldiers are{Line} combat specialists.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Вы наемники. Солдаты.{Line} Лучшие из лучших.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“BUT...{Line} That is only one aspect of SeeD.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Но не только!{Line} И когда придет время...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“When the time comes...”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Директор. У нас скоро совещание.{Line} Пожалуйста, можно чуть короче?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Headmaster... It’s almost time for{Line} the meeting. Please make this short.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Сиды - это наша гордость!”{Next}“Репутация сада зависит{Line} от каждого из вас.”{Next}“Добросовестно выполняйте{Line} задания и не позорьте честь мундира.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“SeeD is a{Line} valuable asset to Garden.”{Next}“It’s reputation is solely dependant{Line} on each one of you.”{Next}“Handle your mission with care.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Вы это хотели сказать?..”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Is that what you wanted{Line} to say, sir?”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Каждому из вас присвоен{Line} ранг в зависимости от успехов{Line} в учебе, рекомендаций{Line} инструктора и действий во{Line} время полевого экзамена.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Here is your SeeD rank report!”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“*шепчет*{Line} (С нетерпением жду садового фестиваля.)”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Psst...Psst...{Line} (I’m looking forward to the Garden Festival.)”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“*шепчет*{Line} (Не сдавайся, даже если{Line} что-то не получается.)”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Psst...Psst...{Line} (Do your best, even if you don’t stand out.)”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“*шепчет*{Line} (Попытайся контролировать эмоции.)”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Psst...Psst...{Line} (Try to control your emotions a little.)”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“*шепчет*{Line} (Наконец-то... Мастер ганблейда.)”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Psst...Psst...{Line} (Finally... A gunblade specialist.)”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“На этом церемония посвящения{Line} завершена. Разойтись!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“This ends the SeeD inauguration.{Line} Dismissed!”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Во время выполнения заданий,{Line} тебе придется использовать стражей...”{Next}“Не обращай внимания на слухи и{Line} нелепые домыслы, о рациональности их{Line} использования и каком-то там вреде здоровью!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“It is expected you will be using{Line} quite a number of GFs along the way...”{Next}“Be sure to ignore all the GF criticism you{Line} hear from other Gardens or military forces.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“*шепчет*{Line} (Надеюсь, как-нибудь нам{Line} удастся поговорить наедине.)”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Psst...Psst...{Line} (We’ll talk privately one day.)”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Yes? What is it?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Yes? What is it?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Oh, {Char Squall}.{Line} I forgot to give you this.”{Next}“It’s a cursed item, but if{Line} one with enough power uses it,{Line} it should prove quite helpful.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Oh, {Char Squall}.{Line} I forgot to give you this.”{Next}“It’s a cursed item, but if{Line} one with enough power uses it,{Line} it should prove quite helpful.”

Monologue.Current: Received [Magical Lamp]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Magical Lamp]!

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“It’s your first mission. Good luck.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“It’s your first mission. Good luck.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Xu has told me about the missiles.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Xu has told me about the missiles.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The intercom is down so we can’t{Line} announce the order to evacuate.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The intercom is down so we can’t{Line} announce the order to evacuate.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Xu, Raijin, and Fujin{Line} are taking care of that.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Xu, Raijin, and Fujin{Line} are taking care of that.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I want you to assist them{Line} and then evacuate.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I want you to assist them{Line} and then evacuate.”

Monologue.Current: (...What’s on your mind?)
Monologue.Original: (...What’s on your mind?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“But I have a lot to report.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“But I have a lot to report.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You can tell me later.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You can tell me later.”

Monologue.Current: (You might be dead later...)
Monologue.Original: (You might be dead later...)

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Do you have a problem with that?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Do you have a problem with that?”

Monologue.Current: (Yeah. What are you going to do?)
Monologue.Original: (Yeah. What are you going to do?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir, what are you going to do?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir, what are you going to do?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I’m going to stay here and see this to the{Line} end. After all, this place is like my home.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I’m going to stay here and see this to the{Line} end. After all, this place is like my home.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“You’re plannin’ on dying here!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“You’re plannin’ on dying here!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“No...! You can’t!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“No...! You can’t!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Just come with us, please!{Line} You can always rebuild this place!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Just come with us, please!{Line} You can always rebuild this place!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Sir!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Sir!”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“I don’t think that’s a good idea.”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“I don’t think that’s a good idea.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You can rest assured.{Line} I am just going to try something.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You can rest assured.{Line} I am just going to try something.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“There still may be a way{Line} to save the Garden.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“There still may be a way{Line} to save the Garden.”

Monologue.Current: (Against missiles...? How?)
Monologue.Original: (Against missiles...? How?)

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“{Char Squall}, where you goin’!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“{Char Squall}, where you goin’!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re just gonna leave him?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re just gonna leave him?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} We just can’t leave him.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} We just can’t leave him.”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Where do you think you’re going?”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Where do you think you’re going?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Heh heh... I’m too old for this.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Heh heh... I’m too old for this.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir, I’d like to handle whatever{Line} it is that you’re planning.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir, I’d like to handle whatever{Line} it is that you’re planning.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“And why is that?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“And why is that?”

Monologue.Current: (...I don’t know... Because{Line} you might screw up.){Next}(...Because I want to do more{Line} than announce the evacuation.){Line}(Because this place is important to me, too.){Next}(Because I want to find out your plan.){Line}(Because this is my home.){Next}(I have too many reasons.){Next}(I don’t know why... Who cares?)
Monologue.Original: (...I don’t know... Because{Line} you might screw up.){Next}(...Because I want to do more{Line} than announce the evacuation.){Line}(Because this place is important to me, too.){Next}(Because I want to find out your plan.){Line}(Because this is my home.){Next}(I have too many reasons.){Next}(I don’t know why... Who cares?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“My feelings have nothing{Line} to do with it, sir.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“My feelings have nothing{Line} to do with it, sir.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Heh heh, Quistis was right.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Heh heh, Quistis was right.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You do have a hard time{Line} expressing your feelings.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You do have a hard time{Line} expressing your feelings.”

Monologue.Current: (Why bother.{Line} And what is this?{Line} Why am I being judged?)
Monologue.Original: (Why bother.{Line} And what is this?{Line} Why am I being judged?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir! Please tell us{Line} your plan!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sir! Please tell us{Line} your plan!”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This building used to be a shelter,{Line} long before it was remodeled into{Line} the Garden as we know it.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This building used to be a shelter,{Line} long before it was remodeled into{Line} the Garden as we know it.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Use that key to open{Line} the lock on the elevator.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Use that key to open{Line} the lock on the elevator.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Opening the lock will give you{Line} access to the MD level.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Opening the lock will give you{Line} access to the MD level.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Rumor has it that further below the MD level,{Line} there is some kind of a control system.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Rumor has it that further below the MD level,{Line} there is some kind of a control system.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“It was used when this place was still{Line} a shelter, so I’ve never seen it.”{Next}“And I have no idea{Line} what it does.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“It was used when this place was still{Line} a shelter, so I’ve never seen it.”{Next}“And I have no idea{Line} what it does.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“All I know is that it was used for{Line} the shelter, so it might prove{Line} effective against the missiles.”{Next}“That’s what{Line} I’m betting on.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“All I know is that it was used for{Line} the shelter, so it might prove{Line} effective against the missiles.”{Next}“That’s what{Line} I’m betting on.”

Monologue.Current: (Sounds pretty farfetched.{Line} But I guess it’s better than doing nothing.)
Monologue.Original: (Sounds pretty farfetched.{Line} But I guess it’s better than doing nothing.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I understand.”{Next}“We’ll find the control system{Line} and check it out.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I understand.”{Next}“We’ll find the control system{Line} and check it out.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Good luck to all of you.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Good luck to all of you.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Who knows what you may run into{Line} down there. Make sure you are{Line} prepared before you go down.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Who knows what you may run into{Line} down there. Make sure you are{Line} prepared before you go down.”

Monologue.Current: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.
Monologue.Original: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Yes? A game of cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Yes? A game of cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Cards? At a time like this?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Cards? At a time like this?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“There isn’t much time...{Line} Let’s just get on with it.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“There isn’t much time...{Line} Let’s just get on with it.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“{Char Squall}, возьми{Line} ещё вот это...”{Next}“Счётчик сражений. Можешь{Line} заглянуть в него из меню{Line} «Отчёт о сражениях» в разделе{Line} «Информация», в руководстве.”{Next}“Надеюсь, он тебе{Line} пригодится.”
